title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
text:
{{Marvel Database:Film Template | Image = The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 003.jpg | Aliases = Blue Moon (working title) | Directors = Matt Shakman | Producers = Kevin Feige | ComicWriters = [[Stan Lee]]; [[Jack Kirby]] | ScreenplayWriters = Josh Friedman; Cameron Squires; Eric Pearson; Peter Cameron | Musicians = [[Michael Giacchino]] | Cinematographers = Jess Hall | Editors = | Distributors = Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures | ProductionCompanies = Marvel Studios | Running Time = | Rating = | Budget = | Release Date = July 25, 2025 | IMDB ID = 10676052 | Marvel Movies = The Fantastic 4: First Steps | MCU = The Fantastic Four: First Steps | Previous Film = Thunderbolts* | Next Film = | Next Film2 = {{sld|Avengers: Doomsday}} | Appearances = '''Featured Characters:''' *
'''Supporting Characters:''' *

'''Locations:''' *

'''Vehicles:''' *
| Plot = | Cast = * {{WP|Pedro Pascal}} as '''[[Reed Richards (Earth-TRN1600)|Mister Fantastic / Reed Richards]]''' * {{WP|Vanessa Kirby}} as '''[[Susan Storm (Earth-TRN1600)|Invisible Woman / Sue Storm]]''' * {{WP|Joseph Quinn (actor)|Joseph Quinn}} as '''[[Jonathan Storm (Earth-TRN1600)|Human Torch / Johnny Storm]]''' * {{WP|Ebon Moss-Bachrach}} as '''[[Benjamin Grimm (Earth-TRN1600)|Thing / Ben Grimm]]''' * {{WP|Matthew Wood (sound editor)|Matthew Wood}} as '''[[Highly Engineered Robot Built for Interdimensional Exploration (Earth-TRN1600)|H.E.R.B.I.E.]]'''{{cite|ref=true|url=https://www.empireonline.com/movies/news/fantastic-four-first-steps-herbie-alive-cast-exclusive/|refname=H.E.R.B.I.E.|title= Matthew Wood will voice H.E.R.B.I.E. in The Fantastic Four: First Steps|work=Empire|author=Ben Travis|accessdate=May 6, 2025|quote= We’ve had him driving around the set, cleaning, picking up toys, serving Martinis…” And he’ll have extra personality, too, courtesy of a vocal performance by legendary sound editor and voice actor '''Matthew Wood''' – aka the man behind ''General Grievous''. “He’s charming, he’s funny — but he also will break your heart, which I hope is emblematic of the movie.|quotespeaker=[[Matt Shakman]]}} * {{WP|Julia Garner}} as '''[[Shalla-Bal (Earth-TRN1600)|Shalla-Bal / Silver Surfer]]''' * {{WP|Ralph Ineson}} as '''[[Galan (Earth-TRN1600)|Galactus]]''' * {{WP|Mark Gatiss}} as '''[[Ted Gilbert (Earth-TRN1600)|Ted Gilbert]]''' * {{WP|Sarah Niles}} as '''[[Lynne (Earth-TRN1600)|Lynne]]''' * To-be-confirmed actor as '''[[Franklin Richards (Earth-TRN1600)|Franklin Richards]]'''{{cite|ref=true|url=https://twitter.com/F4Update/status/1923237305852043735|refname=Franklin|title= First look at ‘THE FANTASTIC FOUR: FIRST STEPS’ Funko Pops. Pre-order will begin tomorrow.|work=Twitter|date= May 116, 2025|accessdate= May 16, 2025}} Additionally, {{WP|Paul Walter Hauser}}, {{WP|John Malkovich}} and {{WP|Natasha Lyonne}} have been cast in undisclosed roles. | Notes = | Trivia = * [[Jon Watts]] was originally announced to direct the film,{{cite web|url= https://www.marvel.com/articles/movies/marvel-studios-announces-fantastic-four-film-jon-watts/|title= Breaking: Marvel Studios Announces ‘Fantastic Four’ Feature Film|work= Marvel.com|last= Dinh|first= Christine|date= December 11, 2020|accessdate= February 12, 2025}} but later exited production.{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/04/spider-man-jon-watts-exits-marvel-fantastic-four-film-1235013110/|title= ‘Spider-Man’ Director Jon Watts Exits Marvel’s ‘Fantastic Four’|work= Deadline|last= Fleming, Jr.|first= Mike|date= April 29, 2022|accessdate= August 27, 2022}} He was replaced by [[Matt Shakman]] months later.{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/08/star-trek-fantastic-four-matt-shakman-1235101358/|title= Matt Shakman Departing ‘Star Trek’ After Landing ‘Fantastic Four’ Directing Gig|work= Deadline|last= D'Alessandro|first= Anthony|coauthors= Kroll, Justin|date= August 26, 2022|accessdate= August 27, 2022}} * Originally slated to be released on November 8, 2024, this film was later pushed back to February 14, 2025,{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/10/blade-fantastic-four-avengers-secret-wars-release-dates-shift-1235141388/|title= Marvel Shifts Release Dates For ‘Blade’, ‘Fantastic Four’, ‘Avengers: Secret Wars’, Next ‘Deadpool’ Among Disney Moves|work= Deadline|last= Grobar|first= Matt|date= October 11, 2022|accessdate= October 12, 2022}} and later to May 2, 2025.{{cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/disney-moves-avatar-star-wars-avengers-1235514145/|title=‘Avatar 3’ Pushed a Year to 2025, Two ‘Star Wars’ Movies Head for 2026 and ‘Avengers’ Films Delayed|work=The Hollywood Reporter|last=Couch|first=Aaron|date=June 13, 2023|accessdate=June 13, 2023}} * The film was originally announced under the title ''Fantastic Four'' in 2020. It was later announced at {{WP|San Diego Comic Con}} 2024 that the film would be titled ''The Fantastic Four: First Steps''.{{cite web|url= https://www.marvel.com/articles/live-events/sdcc-2024-the-fantastic-four-first-steps-marvel-studios-hall-h-panel|title= SDCC 2024: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Flies into Hall H|work= Marvel.com|last= Coggan|first= Devan|date= July 28, 2024|accessdate= February 12, 2025}} ==Gallery== ====Logos==== Fantastic Four (2025 film) logo 001.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps logo 001.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps logo 001.png ====Posters==== The Fantastic Four First Steps Valentine's Day poster.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps Valentine's Day poster textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps New Year poster.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps New Year poster textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps April 4th poster.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps April 4th poster textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 001.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 001 textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 002.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 002 textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 003.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 003 textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 004.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 004 Textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 005.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 005 Textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 006.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 006 Textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 007.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 007 Textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 008.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 008 Textless.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 009.jpg The Fantastic Four First Steps poster 009 Textless.jpg ==Videos== ====Trailers==== The Fantastic Four- First Steps - Official Teaser - Only in Theaters July 25 The Fantastic Four- First Steps - Official Trailer - Only in Theaters July 25 | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]] }} [[ru:Фантастическая четвёрка: Первые шаги]]
